name: Axe
title: Mogul Khan
lore: As a grunt in the Turstarkuri army, Mogul Khan had no rival in combat, and no equal on the field of war.

berserkerCall.name: Berserker's Call
berserkerCall.description: Axe taunts all nearby enemies, forcing them to attack him while gaining bonus armor.

battleHunger.name: Battle Hunger
battleHunger.description: Enrages an enemy, causing them to take damage over time until they kill a unit or the duration ends.

counterHelix.name: Counter Helix
counterHelix.description: When attacked, Axe has a chance to spin and deal damage to all nearby enemies.

cullingBlade.name: Culling Blade
cullingBlade.description: Axe spots weakness and strikes, instantly killing an enemy if their health is below a threshold. Kills grant bonus speed.
